Articles.Content:
hey Guys

I am Currently Fixing up the Add on wiki page

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=List_of_addons

obviously i\'m going to miss a few so i would like it if you would kindly check the page and see if your Add ons have been added.

If they haven\'t. Post On this Topic Your Add on Link. Add on Name. And a Small description ( like 1-30 words).

If i have included yours But i have Done Something Wrong(or missed something).

do the same as above and i will Change the Details to suit what you want.

Thanks

As you do it, if you can, can you add a notice if the mod pack suffers from pink-texture syndrome?

I know I can fix it myself, but it\'ll be nice when the mod authors updated theirs for 11.1

|pink-texture syndrome

Why the hell does that make me laugh so hard.

Anyways, this thread might be going unappreciated, but it\'s a neat little idea for some people that don\'t visit these forums. I like it. [bUMP]
